scripts.build: yarn workspace root.drio build && yarn workspace saas.drio build
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio start" "yarn workspace saas.drio start"
scripts.serve: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio serve" "yarn workspace saas.drio serve"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio dev" "yarn workspace saas.drio dev" "yarn workspace logistics-ui dev"
